rule.name: CASE_APP_SR_uiGetRequestersDetails
rule.description: Displays a section that allows users to capture their request details
rule.definition: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "How may we help you?", firstColumnContents:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label:"Please describe your request", instructions:"Describe your request and how we can help you.", value:ri!serviceReq.comment, saveInto:ri!serviceReq.comment, required:true ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Requester's Name", labelPosition: "ABOVE", instructions: "Name of the person any follow up should be addressed to.", value: ri!serviceReq.requesterName, saveInto: ri!serviceReq.requesterName, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {}, align: "LEFT" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Requester's Email", labelPosition: "ABOVE", instructions: "The email where notifications and updates on this case should go to.", value: ri!serviceReq.requesterEmail, saveInto: ri!serviceReq.requesterEmail, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {}, align: "LEFT" ) }, iscollapsible: true ), #"_a-0000dd65-b59d-8000-1a8d-01ef9001ef90_6262"( targetFolder: #"_a-0000da5f-caaa-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_2780", uploadedDocs:ri!uploadedDocs, gridLabel:"Upload Supporting Document(s)", isRequired: false ) }
